mapper.insert: insert into car_customer_board (id, customer_id, board_real_id, bind_status, create_time, create_person, modify_time, modify_person) values (#{id}, #{customerId}, #{boardRealId}, #{bindStatus}, #{createTime}, #{createPerson}, #{modifyTime}, #{modifyPerson})
mapper.update: update car_customer_board set bind_status = #{bindStatus}, modify_time = #{modifyTime}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson} where board_real_id = #{boardRealId} and bind_status='1'
update car_customer_board set bind_status = '2', modify_time = #{modifyTime}, modify_person = #{modifyPerson} where customer_id = #{customerId} and board_real_id = #{boardRealId} and bind_status='1'
